title: Photo-catalytic and biological applications of phyto-functionalized zinc oxide nanoparticles synthesized using a polar extract of Equisetum diffusum D
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22344-22358
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03573A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Nasir Assad, Azhar Abbas, Muhammad Fayyaz ur Rehman, Muhammad Naeem-ul-Hassan
In this study, zinc oxide nanoparticles (ZnO NPs) were fabricated using Equisetum diffusum D extract and their diverse properties and applications were studied.
